A minimal set of screen failure information is', 'required to ensure transparent reporting of screen failure patients to meet the Consolidated', 'Standards of Reporting Trials publishing requirements and to respond to queries from regulatory', 'authorities. Minimal information includes demography, screen failure details, eligibility criteria,', 'and any serious adverse event (SAE).', 'Individuals who do not meet the criteria for participation in this study (screen failure) may be', 'rescreened once based on discussion and agreement between the Investigator and the Medical', 'Monitor.', 'A patient who experiences a gMG Clinical Deterioration or exacerbation/crisis during the', 'Screening Period will be considered a screening failure. The comparator product is', 'formulated as a matching sterile, clear, colorless solution with the same buffer components, but', 'without active ingredient.
